attributes.action: immediately dismiss Baroness Scotland from the post of Attorney General
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Baroness Scotland now has a criminal record due to her being found guilty of breaking the law over her employment of an illegal immigrant she is no longer a suitable person to occupy the post of Attorney General. Law breakers cannot be law makers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
